title: Drawing, "Mountain Range", 1872
medium:
Recto: Brush and blue watercolor, black and gray wash, and graphite on tan paper.
Verso: Graphite on tan paper.
signed: Signed with initials and dated in graphite,  lower right: T. M. /..../1872.
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite, lower right: T.M. / Falls of the Yosemite (2700) feet from the Merced 1872.
A stamp with the cipher TM at left.
description:
Recto: Vertical view with a mountain river winding from the foreground to a rugged range of mountains in the distance.
Verso: horizontal sketch of mountain range.

exhibitions.title: Frederic Church, Winslow Homer & Thomas Moran: Tourism and the American Landscape

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mountain Range", 1872.
1872. Recto: Brush and blue watercolor, black and gray wash, and graphite on tan paper.
Verso: Graphite on tan paper.. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-13.
